attributes.action: Make bendy buses make accordian noises as they go round corners
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that the public's perception of bendy buses could be changed to a more positive one if the buses were to make accordian noises as they cornered. They would make cities a more cheerful place to live and work and attract tourists in their thousands!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
